snippet: The Syrian government, preparing for peace talks with rebels next week, handed the Russian co-sponsors of the conference a proposal on Friday for a ceasefire in Aleppo and an exchange of prisoners....

headline.print_headline: Syria Offers Aleppo Truce as Rebels Argue Over Talks
headline.main: Syria Offers Aleppo Truce as Rebels Argue Over Talks

lead_paragraph: The Syrian government, preparing for peace talks with rebels next week, handed the Russian co-sponsors of the conference a proposal on Friday for a ceasefire in Aleppo and an exchange of prisoners.
